description:
To raise awareness on human trafficking, I recently partnered with other bloggers, influencers and friends to shed light on one of the biggest problems facing us today.
.
.
.
Did you know? Each year, an estimated 600,000 to 800,000 men, women, and children are trafficked across international borders (some international and non-governmental organizations place the number far higher), and the trade is growing. Human trafficking is not just a social issue but a racial justice issue as well due to the disproportionate number of children of color who are trafficked each year. Racism and oppression are deeply embedded and perpetuated in human trafficking. 
.
.
.
Today, we want to bring you resources that can help us in this fight. Letâ€™s take a stand for all the lives being effected by this illegal trade! 
.
.
.
Visit: www.dosomething.com to see how you can get involved! #whereareallthechildren
